action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_hub_step_instance</document><document_key>3e7cd33d4759c21066773e7d826d43e4</document_key><order>600</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-02 10:18:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>fa7c173d4759c21066773e7d826d4322</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-02 10:18:50</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
// ... code ...
	var pceConfigGr = inputs.labelDimension.illumio_pce_configuration.getRefRecord();
    var details = {
        "key": inputs.labelDimension.getValue("key").trim(),
		"display_name_singular": (inputs.displayName.trim()) ? inputs.displayName : inputs.labelDimension.getValue("display_name_singular"),
		"display_name_plural": (inputs.displayNameplural.trim()) ? inputs.displayNameplural : inputs.labelDimension.getValue("display_name_plural"),
		"label_type_initial": (inputs.labelTypeInitial.trim()) ? inputs.labelTypeInitial : inputs.labelDimension.getValue("label_type_initial"),
		"illumio_pce_configuration": pceConfigGr.getValue("sys_id"),
		"href": inputs.labelDimension.getValue("href").trim();
	}
	var IlUtils = new x_illu2_illumio.IllumioUtils();
	var stringParams = {
		"url": pceConfigGr.pce_url + "",
        "href": inputs.labelDimension.getValue("href")
	}

	var pce_authorization = gs.base64Encode(pceConfigGr.username.getDecryptedValue() + ":" + pceConfigGr.secret_key.getDecryptedValue());
	var headers = {"Authorization": "Basic " + pce_authorization};
    var body = {
        "display_name": details["display_name_singular"],
        "display_info": {
            "initial": details["label_type_initial"],
            "display_name_plural": details["display_name_plural"]
        },
    };

	var midServer = pceConfigGr.mid_server.name + "";
	var response = IlUtils.makeRestCall("IllumioFetchLabelDimensions", "UpdateLabelDimension", stringParams, headers, body, midServer);
	outputs.status = response.getStatusCode();;
	outputs.response = response.getBody();
})(inputs, outputs);
